channel.title: Hyperion
channel.description:
I KNOW THIS IS A CLIENT ISSUE: BUT, NOBODY WOULD HELP ME IN THE CLIENT HELP SECTION!!
Okay, I've never coded a hyperion server, but I'm going to try to.
I've downloaded this: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,428517.0.html
BUT, the problem is, I don't know how to make the client run...

item.title: Hyperion
item.dc:creator: @_synchronized ~synchronized
item.description:
@_synchronized wrote:

Please specify the client error in the cmd if it exists, make sure you have the correct cache in the correct folder. If not make sure you run your client in an IDE and compile before running.

Read full topic
